author: Susan Thorpe
text: The City of Corpus Christi is beginning a Custoemr Service Initiative to include mission, vision, training and assessment. we would like to conduct a secret shoper to establish a baseline, identify training needs, and then gauge our improvement. I would like the names of firms or resources that any other organizations have used for secret shopper programs, as well as any outstanding training firms for customer service. Any adivce or observations are welcome.  Thanks in advance for your help.
title: Secret Shopper Program and Trainers for Customer Service
